message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand your concern, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $140? It's a great compromise, and I think you'll still get a fantastic deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $140 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to go even lower?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $130? It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I really appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $130 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
